spec_data.Name: perl-Text-Brew
spec_data.Description:
This module implements the Brew edit distance that is very close to the
dynamic programming technique used for the Wagner-Fischer (and so for the
Levenshtein) edit distance.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:14:50 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Implementation of the Brew edit distance
